history.proof: intros A x v₁ v₂ dom m. unfold add. shelve.

ctx: intros A x v₁ v₂ dom m.
exceptions.tactic: rewrite <- add_cancel with (x:=x) (v:=v₁) (m:=add A dom x v₂ m) at 2.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type x : key v₁, v₂ : A dom : Dom.t m : t A dom The term "A" has type "Type" while it is expected to have type "key".

ctx: intros A x v₁ v₂ dom m.
exceptions.tactic: apply eq_trans with (m₂:=add A dom x v₂ m); auto.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type x : key v₁, v₂ : A dom : Dom.t m : t A dom The term "A" has type "Type" while it is expected to have type "key".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
∀ (A : Type) (x : key) (v₁ v₂ : A) (dom : Dom.t) (m : t A dom), eq (add A (Dom.add x dom) x v₂ (add A dom x v₁ m)) (add A dom x v₂ m)

Premises:
t = S.t : Type → Dom.t → Type Arguments t _%type_scope
Module Dom : (MSetInterface.SetsOn X) with Definition elt := X.t := S.Dom 
add : ∀ x : key, ?A → t ?A ?dom → t ?A (Dom.add x ?dom) where ?A : [ |- Type] ?dom : [ |- Dom.t]
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX → Tauto.GFormula | A : TA → AA → Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula → Tauto.GFormula → Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula → Tauto.GFormula → Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula → Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula → option AF → Tauto.GFormula → Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.D {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.N {TA TX AA AF}%type
key = X.t : Type
eq : ∀ dom₁ dom₂ : Dom.t, t ?A dom₁ → t ?A dom₂ → Prop where ?A : [ |- Type]
add_cancel : ∀ (A : Type) (x : key) (v : A) (dom : Dom.t) (m : t A dom), find x m = Some v → eq (add x v m) m
add_compat : ∀ (A : Type) (x y : X.t) (v : A) (dom₁ dom₂ : Dom.t) (m₁ : t A dom₁) (m₂ : t A dom₂), X.eq x y → eq m₁ m₂ → eq (add x v m₁) (add y v m₂)
add_None : ∀ (A : Type) (x y : key) (v : A) (dom : Dom.t) (m : t A dom), find y (add x v m) = None ↔ ¬ X.eq y x ∧ find y m = None
find_dom : ∀ (A : Type) (x : key) (v : A) (dom : Dom.t) (m : t A dom), find x m = Some v → Dom.In x dom
find_None : ∀ (A : Type) (dom : Dom.t) (x : key) (m : t A dom), find x m = None ↔ ¬ Dom.In x dom
remove_cancel : ∀ (A : Type) (x : key) (dom : Dom.t) (m : t A dom), find x m = None → eq (remove x m) m
add_Some : ∀ (A : Type) (x y : key) (v u : A) (dom : Dom.t) (m : t A dom), find y (add x v m) = Some u ↔ X.eq y x ∧ u = v ∨ ¬ X.eq y x ∧ find y m = Some u
S.combine_spec : ∀ (A B C : Type) (f : A → B → C) (g₁ : A → C) (g₂ : B → C) (dom₁ dom₂ : S.Dom.t) (m₁ : S.t A dom₁) (m₂ : S.t B dom₂) (x : S.key) (v : C), S.find x (S.combine f g₁ g₂ m₁ m₂) = Some v ↔ (∃ (v₁ : A) (v₂ : B), S.find x m₁ = Some v₁ ∧ S.find x m₂ = Some v₂ ∧ v = f v₁ v₂) ∨ (∃ v₁ : A, S.find x m₁ = Some v₁ ∧ S.find x m₂ = None ∧ v = g₁ v₁) ∨ (∃ v₂ : B, S.find x m₁ = None ∧ S.find x m₂ = Some v₂ ∧ v = g₂ v₂)
set_None : ∀ (A : Type) (x : Dom.elt) (y : key) (v : A) (dom : Dom.t) (m : t A dom) (Hin : Dom.In x dom), find y (set x v m Hin) = None ↔ ¬ X.eq y x ∧ find y m = None
remove_None : ∀ (A : Type) (x : Dom.elt) (y : key) (dom : Dom.t) (m : t A dom), find y (remove x m) = None ↔ X.eq y x ∨ find y m = None
remove_Some : ∀ (A : Type) (x : Dom.elt) (y : key) (u : A) (dom : Dom.t) (m : t A dom), find y (remove x m) = Some u ↔ ¬ X.eq y x ∧ find y m = Some u
add_compat2 : ∀ (A : Type) (x : Dom.elt) (dom : Dom.t), Proper (Logic.eq ==> eq (dom₂:=dom) ==> eq (dom₂:=Dom.add x dom)) (add x)
S.add_same : ∀ (A : Type) (x : S.key) (v : A) (dom : S.Dom.t) (m : S.t A dom), S.find x (S.add x v m) = Some v
S.find_spec : ∀ (A : Type) (x : S.key) (dom : S.Dom.t) (m : S.t A dom), (∃ v : A, S.find x m = Some v) ↔ S.Dom.In x dom
S.set_same : ∀ (A : Type) (x : S.key) (v : A) (dom : S.Dom.t) (m : S.t A dom) (Hin : S.Dom.In x dom), S.find x (S.set x v m Hin) = Some v
S.remove_same : ∀ (A : Type) (x : S.key) (dom : S.Dom.t) (m : S.t A dom), S.find x (S.remove x m) = None
S.domain_spec : ∀ (A : Type) (dom : S.Dom.t) (m : S.t A dom), S.domain m = dom
set_Some : ∀ (A : Type) (x : Dom.elt) (y : key) (v u : A) (dom : Dom.t) (m : t A dom) (Hin : Dom.In x dom), find y (set x v m Hin) = Some u ↔ X.eq y x ∧ u = v ∨ ¬ X.eq y x ∧ find y m = Some u
remove_compat : ∀ (A : Type) (x y : X.t) (dom₁ dom₂ : Dom.t) (m₁ : t A dom₁) (m₂ : t A dom₂), X.eq x y → eq m₁ m₂ → eq (remove x m₁) (remove y m₂)
S.find_elt_compat : ∀ (A : Type) (dom : S.Dom.t) (m : S.t A dom), Proper (X.eq ==> Logic.eq) (λ x : X.t, S.find x m)
incl_refl : ∀ (A : Type) (dom : Dom.t), t A dom → Reflexive (incl (dom₂:=dom))
S.set_other : ∀ (A : Type) (x y : X.t) (v : A) (dom : S.Dom.t) (m : S.t A dom) (Hin : S.Dom.In x dom), ¬ X.eq y x → S.find y (S.set x v m Hin) = S.find y m
find_compat : ∀ (A : Type) (x y : X.t) (dom₁ dom₂ : Dom.t) (m₁ : t A dom₁) (m₂ : t A dom₂), X.eq x y → eq m₁ m₂ → find x m₁ = find y m₂
set_compat : ∀ (A : Type) (x y : Dom.elt) (v : A) (dom₁ dom₂ : Dom.t) (m₁ : t A dom₁) (m₂ : t A dom₂) (Hin₁ : Dom.In x dom₁) (Hin₂ : Dom.In y dom₂), X.eq x y → eq m₁ m₂ → eq (set x v m₁ Hin₁) (set y v m₂ Hin₂)
S.add_other : ∀ (A : Type) (x y : X.t) (v : A) (dom : S.Dom.t) (m : S.t A dom), ¬ X.eq y x → S.find y (S.add x v m) = S.find y m
eq_trans : ∀ (A : Type) (dom₁ dom₂ dom3 : Dom.t) (m₁ : t A dom₁) (m₂ : t A dom₂) (m3 : t A dom3), eq m₁ m₂ → eq m₂ m3 → eq m₁ m3
eq_sym : ∀ (A : Type) (dom₁ dom₂ : Dom.t) (m₁ : t A dom₁) (m₂ : t A dom₂), eq m₁ m₂ → eq m₂ m₁
S.remove_other : ∀ (A : Type) (x y : X.t) (dom : S.Dom.t) (m : S.t A dom), ¬ X.eq y x → S.find y (S.remove x m) = S.find y m
S.constant_None : ∀ (A : Type) (dom : S.Dom.t) (v : A) (x : S.key), S.find x (S.constant dom v) = None ↔ ¬ S.Dom.In x dom
S.elements_Sorted : ∀ (A : Type) (dom : S.Dom.t) (m : S.t A dom), Sorted (X.lt @@1)%signature (S.elements m)
S.map : ∀ A B : Type, (A → B) → ∀ dom : S.Dom.t, S.t A dom → S.t B dom
S.map_spec : ∀ (A B : Type) (f : A → B) (dom : S.Dom.t) (m : S.t A dom) (x : S.key) (v : B), S.find x (S.map f m) = Some v ↔ (∃ u : A, S.find x m = Some u ∧ f u = v)
S.constant_Some : ∀ (A : Type) (dom : S.Dom.t) (v : A) (x : S.key) (u : A), S.find x (S.constant dom v) = Some u ↔ S.Dom.In x dom ∧ u = v
S.mem_spec : ∀ (A : Type) (x : S.key) (dom : S.Dom.t) (m : S.t A dom), S.mem x m = true ↔ (∃ v : A, S.find x m = Some v)
S.is_empty_spec : ∀ (A : Type) (dom : S.Dom.t) (m : S.t A dom), S.is_empty m = true ↔ (∀ x : S.key, S.find x m = None)
*** [ S.elements : ∀ (A : Type) (dom : S.Dom.t), S.t A dom → list (S.key * A) ] Arguments S.elements {A}%type_scope {dom}
*** [ S.find : ∀ (A : Type) (dom : S.Dom.t), S.key → S.t A dom → option A ] Arguments S.find {A}%type_scope {dom}
S.cast_spec_find : ∀ (A : Type) (dom₁ dom₂ : S.Dom.t) (Heq : S.Dom.eq dom₁ dom₂) (m : S.t A dom₁) (x : S.key), S.find x (S.cast Heq m) = S.find x m
incl_trans : ∀ (A : Type) (dom₁ dom₂ dom3 : Dom.t) (m₁ : t A dom₁) (m₂ : t A dom₂) (m3 : t A dom3), incl m₁ m₂ → incl m₂ m3 → incl m₁ m3
*** [ S.domain : ∀ (A : Type) (dom : S.Dom.t), S.t A dom → S.Dom.t ] Arguments S.domain {A}%type_scope {dom}

```coq
intros A x v₁ v₂ dom m.
unfold add.
rewrite <- add_cancel with (x:=x) (v:=v₁) (m:=add A dom x v₂ m) at 2.
apply eq_trans with (m₂:=add A dom x v₂ m); auto.
Qed.```

original: intros A x v₁ v₂ dom m. unfold add. rewrite <- add_cancel with (x:=x) (v:=v₁) (m:=add A dom x v₂ m) at 2. apply eq_trans with (m₂:=add A dom x v₂ m); auto.
